roomText: Our rooms have a large, comfortable double bed for 2 people with an own bathroom and balcony or terrace. If necessary, an extra bed can be made available.In the large community kitchen you can enjoy breakfast to start the day perfectly.
apartmentText: Our apartments have two rooms with a large double bed. In the kitchen there is also a pull-out couch that can be made available if required. Each apartment has an equipped bathroom and a balcony or terrace.
